question: What common leadership themes are expressed by CEOs of companies that have recently secured funding for cloud-based solutions?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have secured funding for cloud-based solutions. [CompanyDealMaster]
Extract Company IDs of those companies. [CompanyDealMaster]
Retrieve leadership excerpts from CEOs of the identified companies. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Analyze the leadership excerpts to identify common themes. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
